passages.text:
You are in your apartment. At this time, a zombie virus outbreak in your city was reported on TV. The government claimed that there was an evacuation point is in a middle school in the south of the city. 

[[Prepare to take refuge->Prepare]]
passages.name: None

passages.text:
You picked up your M1911A1, there are 7 rounds in the magazine.

[[Keep preparing->Prepare]]
[[Leave the apartment->Streets]]
passages.name: Get Gun

passages.text:
You walked out of the apartment, and the street was a mess, full of screams. There are two ways to go to the evacuation point, one is towards the park and the other is towards the main street. Where are you going?

[[Go to the park->Park]]
[[Go to the main streets->Main Streets]]
passages.name: Streets

passages.text:
You tried to call the police, but no one answered.

[[Keep preparing->Prepare]]
[[Leave the apartment->Streets]]
passages.name: Call Police

passages.text:
What are you going to do now?

[[Pick up your gun->Get Gun]]
[[Leave your apartment->Streets]]
[[Call the police for help->Call Police]]
passages.name: Prepare

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Park

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Main Streets
